```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import signal
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
```

```py
>>> butter = signal.dlti(*signal.butter(3, 0.5))
>>> t, y = signal.dimpulse(butter, n=25)
>>> plt.step(t, np.squeeze(y))
>>> plt.grid()
>>> plt.xlabel('n [samples]')
>>> plt.ylabel('Amplitude') 
```
